summary: Great Directors, directed by Angela Ismailos, features conversations with ten of the world's greatest living directors: Bernardo Bertolucci, David Lynch, Liliana Cavani, Stephen Frears, ... See full summary »
cast: Bernardo Bertolucci|Catherine Breillat|Liliana Cavani|Stephen Frears|Todd Haynes|Angela Ismailos|Richard Linklater|Ken Loach|David Lynch|John Sayles|Agnès Varda|Dana Waters|Charlotte Alexandra|Harriet Andersson|Jeanne Bates|Jean-Paul Belmondo|Dirk Bogarde|Nell Campbell|Amie Carey|Margit Carstensen|Amira Casar|Franco Citti|Jacques Demy|Rainer Werner Fassbinder|Eddra Gale|Jean-Luc Godard|Åke Grönberg|El Hedi ben Salem|Peter Hinwood|Adolf Hitler|Allen Joseph|Anna Karina|Nicky Katt|Corinne Marchand|Brigitte Mira|Silvia Monfort|Lenny Montana|Paul Muni|Laurel Near|Philippe Noiret|Pier Paolo Pasolini|Patricia Quinn|Maria Schneider|Geraldine Sherman|Dina Spybey-Waters|Charlotte Stewart|Jean-François Stévenin|Vickery Turner|Christian Valentin|Gordon Warnecke|Carol White|Harold Wilson|Jane Wyman|Rosel Zech|Delphine Zentout
title: Great Directors
